Room.Name: Goblin Experiment Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a room dedicated to seeing how long you can live.
Room.LongDescription: Not to your old age of course, but to how long you can live with most of your blood removed, or how long you can live with your heart and stomach surgically exposed to the open air. A stone slab with cuffs and belts is the centerpiece of the room, and sharp instruments of all sorts hang on a wall behind you. Scattered on a table close by are tubes and needles, and someone has thoughtlessly tossed the cut-off top of a skull there, still matted with bloody hair.
